column2:
"Nice work! I mean, really! That was
unbelievably helpful."

"Now that I know what I want to use, all that's
left is to figure out how to get it and how to use
it. Looks like I've got my work cut out for me!"
"So this is a token of my gratitude!"

"Thanks a million! I hope you'll lend a hand if
I need anything else!"

"おつかれさまー！
いやー、助かったよ本当に！"

"何を使うかとかのアタリはつけたから
あとは調達手段とか利用方法とか……
うん、ここからはわたしの仕事！"
"ということで、これがお礼だよ！"

"ありがと！
また何かあったらよろしくね！"
